医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
砷暴露是否会导致癌症、糖尿病、阿尔茨海默氏症和先天性异常导致的死亡？地下水污染引起的砷暴露与死亡率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Does-arsenic-exposure-cause-mortality-due-to-cancer-diabetes-Alzheimers-and-congenital-anomalies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Does-arsenic-exposure-cause-mortality-due-to-cancer-diabetes-Alzheimers-and-congenital-anomalies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d44101e-87a5-4030-883f-d33dc021fc3d Thu, 21 Sep 2023 06:01:00 -0400 Does arsenic exposure cause mortality due to cancer, diabetes, Alzheimer's and congenital anomalies?
Quantmetry 还使用 3DHISTECH 的 SimpleSlideInterface 3DHISTECH 很高兴地宣布其最近与 Quantmetry 的合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Quantmetry-also-uses-SimpleSlideInterface-by-3DHISTECH.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Quantmetry-also-uses-SimpleSlideInterface-by-3DHISTECH.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d72b6db-acaa-4296-86fc-16225e3fef85 Thu, 21 Sep 2023 04:36:00 -0400 Quantmetry also uses SimpleSlideInterface by 3DHISTECH
更年期激素治疗与非酒精性脂肪肝有关吗？更年期激素治疗对非酒精性脂肪肝的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Is-menopausal-hormone-therapy-induced-with-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Is-menopausal-hormone-therapy-induced-with-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=645c71d7-f9fb-4cb0-9c56-d5a4b1e08d4f Thu, 21 Sep 2023 04:25:00 -0400 Is menopausal hormone therapy associated with non-alcoholic fatty liver disease?
再想一想：抑制消极想法实际上可以改善心理健康剑桥大学研究人员的新研究表明，抑制消极想法可能毕竟没有害处。训练参与者主动抑制令人担忧的想法，可以减少恐惧感，改善心理健康，挑战“想法抑制会导致适应不良”的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Think-again-Suppressing-negative-thoughts-may-actually-improve-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Think-again-Suppressing-negative-thoughts-may-actually-improve-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b68d9ec9-1455-41dc-b36c-af75c77e4cba Thu, 21 Sep 2023 02:32:00 -0400 Think again: Suppressing negative thoughts may actually improve mental health
遗传生物标志物可以预测您严重食物过敏的风险吗？芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院的研究人员发现了一种遗传生物标志物 α-类胰蛋白酶，它可以预测食物过敏反应的严重程度。这一发现为新的治疗策略打开了大门，并提供了一种区分有严重反应风险的患者的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Could-a-genic-biomarker-predict-your-risk-for-severe-food-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Could-a-genic-biomarker-predict-your-risk-for-severe-food-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1096f5fa-8378-49bd-85bb-c2aea31b068b Thu, 21 Sep 2023 02:17:00 -0400 Could a genetic biomarker predict your risk for severe food allergies?
晨练是预防糖尿病的关键吗？哈佛大学的研究人员发现，早上和下午的体力活动可以显着降低患 2 型糖尿病的风险，但晚上的活动却没有显示出这样的好处。该研究还强调，在降低糖尿病风险方面，强度比一致性更重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Is-morning-exercise-the-key-to-dodging-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Is-morning-exercise-the-key-to-dodging-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=153e56ea-559f-4b58-aff9-b29b1311822e Thu, 21 Sep 2023 02:08:00 -0400 Is morning exercise the key to dodging diabetes?
深部脑刺激能否治愈严重抑郁症？由临床医生、工程师和神经科学家组成的多学科团队利用深部脑刺激 (DBS) 和人工智能，在大脑中发现了一种独特的生物标志物，表明难治性抑郁症已康复。这一发现允许实时监测和调整治疗，可能会彻底改变治疗严重抑郁症的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Can-deep-brain-stimulation-unlock-the-cure-for-severe-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230921/Can-deep-brain-stimulation-unlock-the-cure-for-severe-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bac68d9-5c3e-49aa-b68f-aa4cc35d0dec Thu, 21 Sep 2023 01:56:00 -0400 Can deep brain stimulation unlock the cure for severe depression?
破解梅毒密码：基因组测序揭示传播秘密一项新的《柳叶刀微生物》研究利用全基因组测序揭示了英国梅毒传播动态。该研究确定了不同的传播簇，揭示了基因组数据在跟踪和干预梅毒爆发方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Cracking-syphilis-code-Genome-sequencing-reveals-transmission-secrets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Cracking-syphilis-code-Genome-sequencing-reveals-transmission-secrets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d19112b-d5aa-4713-835d-42202a64cb1a Wed, 20 Sep 2023 23:46:00 -0400 Cracking syphilis code: Genome sequencing reveals transmission secrets
COVID-19 大流行是否导致年轻人健康状况不佳？ 《科学报告》最近的一项研究表明，在 COVID-19 大流行爆发一年后，年轻人的体能参数显着下降，包括爆发力、有氧和无氧能力以及体重。这些变化可能会产生严重的健康影响，特别是对于那些患有糖尿病和心血管疾病的人来说，这凸显了在大流行期间和之后促进身体活动的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Has-the-COVID-19-pandemic-made-young-adults-less-fit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/Has-the-COVID-19-pandemic-made-young-adults-less-fit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db999ab3-ac1e-4a66-ad90-1f26f53912a6 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 23:37:00 -0400 Has the COVID-19 pandemic made young adults less fit?
炎热的夏季与次年死于疟疾的高风险有关随着气候变化的加速，研究气候变化对人类健康的影响变得越来越重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/A-hot-summer-linked-to-high-risk-of-dying-from-malaria-in-the-following-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230920/A-hot-summer-linked-to-high-risk-of-dying-from-malaria-in-the-following-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc844763-8201-4461-99a4-49310ab69cc1 Wed, 20 Sep 2023 23:22:12 -0400 A hot summer linked to high risk of dying from malaria in the following year
